availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John Bennett Stevens (Ohio County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Ohio County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married Jane Baird Stevens in Ohio County, Kentucky, on March 18, 1830. Father of James H. Stevens, Virgil D. D. Stevens, William Stevens, Mary E. Stevens, Sally A. Stevens, Florence E. Stevens, and Joseph Stevens. Farmer in Ohio County in 1850. Owned one enslaved person in Ohio County in 1850. Farmer in Ohio County in 1860. Owned five enslaved persons in Ohio County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
